definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
porous/having many holes (e.g. filter gauze or sieve)

sentences.english: Performance of coating plate with the special hydrophobic coating solution was better.
sentences.chinese: 採用雙疏塗層溶液塗覆的多孔板相對好一些。

sentences.english: The present paper describes the urease covalently bounded to controlled pore glass via glutaraldehyde coupling.
sentences.chinese: 本文將脲酶通過戊二醛的偶聯固定在多孔玻璃珠上。

sentences.english: Porous ceramics is a kind of inorganic non-metal material that mostly includes pores.
sentences.chinese: 多孔陶瓷是一類以氣孔爲主相的無機非金屬材料。

sentences.english: It is revealed that hydroxyl content was also the key factor to q m of porous PS microspheres.
sentences.chinese: 羥基含量也是影響聚蔗糖多孔微球吸附量的主導因素。

sentences.english: Porous alumina was prepared by anodization in oxalic acid electrolyte.
sentences.chinese: 在草酸電解液中，用陽極氧化法制備了多孔氧化鋁。

sentences.english: Sound can be tuned by changing the material of the horizontal supporting pieces or porous vertical pieces.
sentences.chinese: 聲音可以藉由改變橫向配套件或多孔材料垂直件。

sentences.english: The porous nickel was fabricated by using the jet electrodeposition.
sentences.chinese: 採用噴射電沉積方法制備塊體多孔鎳。

sentences.english: In the paper, the alternative characters of current electric conduction of rock-coal porous medium with gas are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了煤巖多孔介質及其充瓦斯後的交流導電性。

sentences.english: Aerogols are a novel nanoporous, noncrystalline material, whose structure can be controlled at nanometer scale.
sentences.chinese: 氣凝膠是一種新型納米多孔非晶態材料，結構可控。

sentences.english: The heating rate has an important effect on the, property of the YSZ porous ceramic tubes.
sentences.chinese: 升溫速度對YSZ多孔陶瓷管的性能有著重要影響。

sentences.english: Clay that, when fired, assumes a colour ranging from dull ochre to red.
sentences.chinese: 經燒製後其顏色從淡赭到紅色不等的粗而多孔的黏土。

sentences.english: The slurry capability is the important factor of the preparation technology of porous bioceramics with controllable macrostructure.
sentences.chinese: 漿料的性能是可控多孔生物陶瓷技術的重要影響因素。

sentences.english: The porousness of snow makes it absorb sound.
sentences.chinese: 雪的多孔性使它能夠吸收聲音。

sentences.english: It discusses the technology of multiporous fine-denier PET POY.
sentences.chinese: 探討了多孔細旦POY生產工藝。

sentences.english: Porous magnesium has obvious advantages as bone tissue engineering biomaterial.
sentences.chinese: 多孔鎂作爲骨組織工程材料具有明顯的優勢。

sentences.english: The homogeneous cell-based assay can be performed in multi-well plates.
sentences.chinese: 這種基於細胞的勻相檢測法可在多孔板中完成。

definition: porous/having many holes (e.g. filter gauze or sieve)
